column1: FOR THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30 (US$ in millions)
Income from loans and guarantees, including realized gains and losses on loans and associated derivatives
Provision for losses on loans, off-balance sheet credit exposures and other receivables
Income from equity investments and associated derivatives
Income from debt securities, including realized gains and losses on debt securities and associated derivatives
Provision for losses on available-for-sale debt securities
Income (loss) from liquid asset trading activities
Foreign currency transaction (losses) gains on non-trading activities
Income (loss) before net unrealized gains and losses on non-trading financial instruments accounted for at fair value and grants to IDA
Net unrealized gains (losses) on non-trading financial instruments accounted for at fair value
